poem.line1: It’s a harsh but grand land,
poem.line2: Where a sea of vines stretches between two mountains.
poem.line3: A land of light and people,
poem.line4: With elders who speak, seated on their bench.
poem.line5: Behind every vine lies a memory,
poem.line6: The sum of doubts and a thousand hopes,
poem.line7: The memory of labor, joy, and laughter.
poem.line8: Me, a kid from elsewhere come here,
poem.line9: I listen to the frozen words whispered by the cers wind,
poem.line10: My eyes drowned in the crimson of the summer sun,
poem.line11: I walk from mailheuls to gobelets,
poem.line12: I try, I sow, I live, I write in wine the stories from here.

1.title: 1. Purpose
1.content: These terms govern access to and use of the website https://www.domaineberthuit.com, published by Domaine Berthuit. By browsing the site, you fully accept these terms.

2.title: 2. Services Provided
2.content: The site allows users to learn about the vineyard, book visits and tastings, buy products, and view news.

3.title: 3. Access and Use
3.content: Access is free and reserved for adults. The publisher makes every effort to ensure site availability.

4.title: 4. User Accounts
4.content: An account is required for certain features. Users are responsible for the confidentiality of their data.

5.title: 5. Bookings and Orders
5.content: Bookings may be free or paid. Payments are secured via Stripe.

6.title: 6. Personal Data
6.content: Personal data is collected to ensure the site's proper operation. See our Privacy Policy.

7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
7.content: Website content is protected. Any reproduction without permission is prohibited.

8.title: 8. Liability
8.content: The publisher disclaims liability in case of interruptions, third-party content, or partner failures.

9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
9.content: These terms may be changed at any time. They apply upon publication.

10.title: 10. Governing Law – Disputes
10.content: These terms are governed by French law. Disputes will be handled by French courts.
